description: There is a typo in the NetAppCmodeISCSIDriver._get_lun_handle() method that causes it to return an object instead of the handle string. This prevents attach/detach and destroy operations from succeeding.
title: NetAppCmodeISCSIDriver sends bad LUN handles in API requests for some operations

comments.content: There is a typo in the NetAppCmodeISCSIDriver._get_lun_handle() method that causes it to return an object instead of the handle string. This prevents attach/detach and destroy operations from succeeding.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bswartz

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/13581
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
